fact_check_explanation_title: Did Sajid Javid open a ‘new hospital’ in Carlisle?
fact_check_explanation_summary: The new cancer centre is on the site of an old building at Carlisle Infirmary.

fact_check_explanation_title: PHE says no need to restart vaccination course in pregnancy after second dose delay
fact_check_explanation_summary: There’s no problem with booking your second dose, even if it’s been a considerable amount of time since your first.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid-19 vaccines are recommended at any stage of pregnancy
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists recommends vaccination at any stage of pregnancy.

fact_check_explanation_title: Video of people falling from plane in Kabul shows a US aircraft
fact_check_explanation_summary: A distressing video of people falling from the underside of an aircraft leaving the airport in Kabul is being shared online.

fact_check_explanation_title: Missing girl ‘news article’ is harvesting Facebook logins
fact_check_explanation_summary: A website claiming you need to verify your age via Facebook to see a video of a suspect in a kidnapping case is not legitimate.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid testing hasn't left 12 million on NHS waiting lists
fact_check_explanation_summary: The NHS waiting list delays are more complex than that, and testing happens in lots of different settings.

fact_check_explanation_title: Trafalgar Square “Freedom Rally” speech littered with false claims
fact_check_explanation_summary: Speaker Vernon Coleman made a litany of misleading claims to an audience of hundreds in Trafalgar Square

fact_check_explanation_title: How long should you wait between vaccines if you’re pregnant?
fact_check_explanation_summary: You should wait a week between your whooping cough or flu vaccine and the Covid vaccine.

fact_check_explanation_title: What we know about Covid-19 vaccines and miscarriages
fact_check_explanation_summary: There’s no evidence that the vaccines are causing miscarriages.

fact_check_explanation_title: What do we know about Covid-19 vaccines and fertility?
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists say that there is no evidence to suggest that the Covid-19 vaccines affect fertility.

fact_check_explanation_title: How media reporting of modelling has shaped our understanding of the pandemic
fact_check_explanation_summary: Scientific modelling has been widely criticised throughout the pandemic. We spoke to some of the leading experts behind the numbers about how they felt their work had been reported .

fact_check_explanation_title: Conservative Woman article falsely claims vaccines don’t work
fact_check_explanation_summary: Claims that natural immunity is ‘complete’ and vaccines are ‘obsolete’ are completely false.
